text:
Is there a task assigned to resolve the verbose issue where ANT cannot execute 
JspC?  Error received = -V0 invalid option.  This option is not specified in 
the build.xml file but ANT puts it in and it is not valid with JspC.
creator: jdhancock@parker.com
peter.reilly@corvil.com
